title: Microsoft Teams: Proactive monitoring of meeting quality using Real-time telemetry (Premium)
description:
Proactive monitoring capability for admins in
the Teams Admin Center (TAC) to identify audio, video and app sharing related
quality issues while the meeting is in progress. Admins can define the desired
monitoring parameters in TAC, which they will be notified of for investigation
of users with poor meeting quality. This monitoring will be based on real-time
meeting quality telemetry data available in TAC.
